install.name: Page Peel Banner
install.author: TemplatePlazza Team
install.description: PagePeel Banner for Joomla 1.5 from TemplatePlazza.com. Candy Joomla Ads System, based on Pageear Script by www.webpicasso.de

param.name: cid
param.label: Banner client
param.description: Client ID (Set if yo choose Joomla Ads)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Category (Set if yo choose Joomla Ads)

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: peelnomirrorclr
param.label: Peel Corner Color If PagePeel Mirror disabled
param.description: Peel Corner Color If Mirroring ortion disabled

param.name: peelautoopenbehaviour
param.label: Auto Open behaviour
param.description: Once view or on every reload page (fill if auto open enable)

param.name: peelcloseautoopen
param.label: Second to Close Peel ( If Auto Open is enabled)

param.name: peeldirection
param.label: Page Peel Direction
param.description: Page Peel Direction, not fully implemented yet

param.name: alterlink
param.label: Alternative Link
param.description: Alternative link when there is no Core Joomla Banner published / recent banner impression expired)

param.name: alterimage
param.label: Alternative Big Peel Image
param.description: Alternative image when there is no Core Joomla Banner published / recent banner impression expired

param.name: peelsmallwidth
param.label: Small Peel Size
param.description: Width and Height size of small peel (px)

param.name: peelbigwidth
param.label: Big Peel Size
param.description: Width and Height size of big peel (px)
